ui.main_menu.title: Dark Descent
key.mechanic.loot_score_bonus.tooltip.de:
The higher this value is, the [key.flavour.positive](higher quality) the loot you find in the [key.flavour.dungeon] will be.
This is an optional 'for-fun' setting. Its intended value is [key.variable.static](0)
key.mechanic.loot_supply_bonus.tooltip.d:
The higher this value is, the [key.flavour.positive](more) loot you will find in the [key.flavour.dungeon].
This is an optional 'for-fun' setting. Its intended value is [key.variable.static](0).
key.mechanic.player_damage_scale.tooltip:
This is a multiplier to the [key.mechanic.damage] dealt by [key.flavour.positive](you).
This is an optional 'for-fun' setting, and also here for accessibility.
Its intended value is [key.variable.static](1).
This is a multiplier to the [key.mechanic.damage] dealt by [key.flavour.negative](enemies).
This is an optional 'for-fun' setting, and also here for accessibility.
Its intended value is [key.variable.static](1).
This is a multiplier to the length of your [key.mechanic.parry_window].
This is an optional 'for-fun' setting, and also here for accessibility.
Its intended value is [key.variable.static](1).
key.mechanic.enemy_speed_scale.tooltip.d:
This is a multiplier to the [key.stat.attack.speed] of [key.flavour.negative](enemies).
This is an optional 'for-fun' setting, and also here for accessibility.
Its intended value is [key.variable.static](1).
